quote: Becoming hurts.
author: Kat Howard

quote: All pain is the same.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding... And could you keep your heart in wonder at the daily miracles of your life, your pain would not seem less wondrous than your joy
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Pain is such a useful thing. It corrects us when we're wrong. It shapes our character. It teaches us that we're alive.
author: C.J. Redwine,  Deception

quote: Behind every beautiful thing, there's some kind of pain.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Pain was good. If I hurt, it meant I wasn't dead.
author: Kristin Cast,  Hunted

quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
author: Haruki Murakami,  What I Talk About When I Talk About Running

quote: My soul hurts.
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: Given the choice between the experience of pain and nothing, I would choose pain.
author: William Faulkner,  The Wild Palms

quote: Excruciating agony makes me cranky.
author: Brandon Mull,  Secrets of the Dragon Sanctuary

quote: From the moment of my birth, I lived with pain at the center of my life. My only purpose in life was to find a way to coexist with intense pain.
author: Haruki Murakami,  The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle

quote: I can do pain. That’s the easy part of life. It’s everything else, happiness, laughter, love, that’s fucking complicated.
author: Jessica Sorensen,  The Coincidence of Callie & Kayden

quote: What hurts us is what heals us
author: Paulo Coelho,  Aleph

quote: A mighty pain to love it is,And 't is a pain that pain to miss;But of all pains, the greatest painIt is to love, but love in vain.
author: Abraham Cowley,  The Poems of Abraham Cowley

quote: Being with her I feel a pain, like a frozen knife stuck in my chest. An awful pain, but the funny thing is I'm thankful for it. It's like that frozen pain and my very existence are one.The pain is an anchor, mooring me here.
author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore

quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
author: Lance Armstrong,  Every Second Counts

quote: Pain is a byproduct of life. That’s the truth. Life sometimes sucks. That’s true for everyone. But if you don’t face the pain and the suck, you don’t ever get the other things either. Laughter. Joy. Love. Pain passes, but those things are worth fighting for. Worth dying for.
author: Jim Butcher,  Vignette

quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: There is too much pain in the world,in all shapes and forms.That is what these people represent.Pain from losing their homes,the death of a loved one,failing an exam,having a leg amputated,not getting a resident permit after years of hoping for a better life...That's what binds them,That's what they potray.Pain.
author: Esther Verhoef,  Close-up

quote: Sometimes you weren't supposed to share pain. Sometimes it was best just to deal with it alone.
author: Sarah Addison Allen,  The Sugar Queen

quote: To hurt is as human as to breathe.
author: J.K. Rowling,  The Tales of Beedle the Bard

quote: Some pains are physical, and some pains are mental, but the one that's both is dental.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: Everything hurts right now and nothing is helping because as the pain is getting worse — so is the love.
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: A lifetime of lonely regret or happiness with some pain along the way.
author: Melissa Nathan,  Persuading Annie

quote: Pain can kill, all on its own: the body goes into shock and shuts down.
author: Teri Terry,  Slated

quote: Spiritual pain is when you can’t stand another moment not knowing the real truth, and when you finally do know you can’t let go.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Everyone is down on pain, because they forget something important about it: Pain is for the living. Only the dead don't feel it.
author: Jim Butcher,  White Night

quote: Sometimes pain is so unmanageable that the idea of spending another day with it seems impossible. Other times pain acts as a compass to help you get through the messier tunnels of growing up. But the pain can only help you find happiness if you can remember it.
author: Adam Silvera,  More Happy Than Not

quote: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Muscles aching to work, minds aching to create - this is man.
author: John Steinbeck,  The Grapes of Wrath

quote: Sometimes a little discomfort in the beginning can save a whole lot of pain down the road.
author: Wendelin Van Draanen,  Flipped

quote: Lord, may the pain be ours, And the weakness that it brings, But at least give us the strength, Of not showing it to anyone!
author: Fernando Pessoa,  Poems of Fernando Pessoa

quote: Joy came always after pain.
author: Guillaume Apollinaire

quote: Hurt is a part of life. To be honest, I think hurt is a part of happiness, that our definition of happiness has gotten very narrow lately, very nervous, a little afraid of this brawling, fabulous, unpredictable world.
author: Julian Gough,  Juno & Juliet

quote: The whole notion of pain, and how every individual experiences pain, is up for debate. We don't know how another person experiences pain - physical pain or psychic pain. Some of these clinics where assisted suicide or euthanasia is practiced, they call it 'weariness of life.'
author: Miriam Toews

quote: I have lived pain, and my life can tell: I only deepen the wound of the world when I neglect to give thanks the heavy perfume of wild roses in early July and the song of crickets on summer humid nights and the rivers that run and the stars that rise and the rain that falls and all the good things that a good God gives.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: There is something terribly morbid in the modern sympathy with pain. One should sympathise with the colour, the beauty, the joy of life. The less said about life's sores the better.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Where there is anger there is always pain underneath.
author: Eckhart Tolle,  The Power of Now

quote: A person feels the pain in judicious proportion to the sensitive nature cherished in own world; otherwise there is enough fun, happiness, enjoyment and pleasure in life.
author: Anuj Somany

quote: The pain I feel now is the happiness I had before. That's the deal.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: I feel like, like pudding,"Iggy groaned. "Pudding with nerve endings. Pudding in great pain.
author: James Patterson,  The Angel Experiment

quote: ...when pain is over, the remembrance of it often becomes a pleasure.
author: Jane Austen,  Persuasion

quote: When pain is intense, you are at a climax. You can then see the light of transcendence.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The great art of life is sensation, to feel that we exist, even in pain.
author: Lord Byron

quote: There is no pain and there are no sorrows. They no longer have permission to live in my today or my tomorrow.
author: Steven Cuoco,  Guided Transformation

quote: Pain and suffering are the soil of strength and courage.
author: Lurlene McDaniel,  Someone Dies, Someone Lives

quote: Now I'm told this is life, and pain's just a simple compromise.
author: Hayley Williams

quote: It hurt, remembering. Hurt because there was so much I'd done, so much I'd yet to do. In so many different ways, I now realized, not remembering had been a blessing. A brief respite in the twisted bloody mess that my life had become.But at least I knew who I was.
author: Keri Arthur,  Destiny Kills

quote: Laughter is the antidote to existential pain
author: S. Spencer Baker,  Slabscape: Reset

quote: The great object of life is sensation- to feel that we exist, even though in pain.
author: George Gordon Byron
